home.lonelyHint: It's lonely out here. Start by sharing a suggestion!
home.lonelyAdmin: It's recommended that you post at least 3 suggestions here before sharing this site. The initial content is key to start the interactions with your audience.
home.defaultWelcome: We'd love to hear what you're thinking about. What can we do better? This is the place for you to vote, discuss and share ideas.

mySettings.title: Settings
mySettings.subtitle: Manage your profile settings
mySettings.privateMessage: Your email is private and will never be publicly displayed.
mySettings.dontHaveEmail: Your account doesn't have an email.
mySettings.gravatarMessage: will be used based on your email. If you don't have a Gravatar, a letter avatar based on your initials is generated for you.
mySettings.letterMessage: A letter avatar based on your initials is generated for you.
mySettings.imageFormatMessage: We accept JPG, GIF and PNG images, smaller than 100KB and with an aspect ratio of 1:1 with minimum dimensions of 50x50 pixels.
mySettings.apiKeyStoreMessage: Stored it securely on your servers and never store it in the client side of your app.
mySettings.apiKeyDoc: To learn how to use the API, read the official documentation .
mySettings.deleteAccountFailed: Failed to delete your account. Try again later

deleteAccountMessage.part1: When you choose to delete your account, we will erase all your personal information forever. The content you have published will remain, but it will be anonymised.
deleteAccountMessage.part2: This process is irreversible. Please be certain.
